timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into gradle-dependency-versioning

timeline.bodyText: Any reason these two use compile not implementation?
timeline.author: ajsutton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,7 +6,7 @@ dependencies {
   implementation project(':util')
 
   compile 'com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat:jackson-dataformat-yaml'
-  compile group: 'org.mapdb', name: 'mapdb', version: '3.0.7'
+  compile 'org.mapdb:mapdb'

replies.bodyText: As of yet unknown. I've got another task to address the compile and runtime usages, as they are deprecated in favour of api, implementation, compileOnly and runtimeOnly depending on precisely how they are needed (plus as those are used elsewhere, it'll keep these build.gradle consistent).
replies.author: CjHare
